block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper Plane 32 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It is the “Windblown" designed by Didier Boursin. This origami airplane is relatively simple to fold and it could fly really far when the wings are properly calibrated. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. Enjoy!!! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 31 : Shuttle Dart by Michael G. LaFosse", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/yIhrTK9_uRQ Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
